title: Which K-pop artists can rap the fastest? - Quora

response.answer_text: The fastest rapper in Korea is Outsider:  He rapped his rap loner on a show at about 16.25 syllables per second. Not to mention he can rap slightly over 22 syllables. You can search it up.  Zico is second at approximately 11.25 syllables per second, which I’m not surprised by. He speaks insanely fast so it isn’t really a shock to be honest.  Changbin is third at 11.13 syllables per second. Technically, his rap isn’t considered an actual rap since it’s just fast speaking but it fits perfectly with the District 9 instrumental and has flow just like other raps so it’s technically a rap because he said it in perfect time and speed.  There’s also Dreamcatcher’s Siyeon. She was doing karaoke of one of Outsider’s raps, which was 11.13 syllables per second. Now the quality isn’t perfect so nobody knows whether or not she might have missed a few syllables but everyone who’s been asked so far, including actual Koreans, have said that it sounds like she’s rapping the whole thing so maybe. But it’s quite fishy since Siyeon is the main vocalist in her group, so how is she better than the rap line?🤔 Maybe the rap line can’t sing as good as she can, which is kinda true, so they made her the main vocalist instead

Changbin (Stray kids) Rookie rapper Changbin debuted with Stray Kids just last year, but he is already climbing the idol rapper ranks to the top. Changbin’s rapping style is both powerful and precise. He is able to aggressively slay each note while keeping perfect time to the beat. Changbin’s performance of “Mastryonshka” impressed his audience from the very first word.  Suga (BTS)  See my answer regarding to suga's rap..*arrow down* Deevin Hoang's answer to How fast can Min Yoongi (Suga) rap? G-Dragon (BigBang) He's pretty much got the game sewn up. Admittedly, he is probably more of a K-Pop star than he is a "rapper," but in a genre where the lines between rapping and singing are now pretty much nonexistent, GD makes our list. Check him out if you're into fast and furious dance moves, and energetic flows over electrohop beats.  Zico (Block B)  he's still very much a pop star. If you want to hear someone that infuses the gloss of K-pop with the verbal gymnastics of a traditional East Coast rapper. Yongguk (BAP)  He is the rapper of the popular K-pop male group B.A.P. Before he became famous as an idol, he used to be a well-known underground rapper under the alias of "Jepp Blackman." He has an amazingly deep and emotional voice. His style is smooth, with great flow and nice rhythm. Due to his huge influence and contribution to Korea's hip-hop music and culture. Junhyung (BEAST/B2ST) He is not only an amazing rapper, but he is also a wonderful songwriter. He is credited as the songwriter and composer for many of the rap lyrics on B2ST's songs. His natural talent for language and composition make his lyrics quite powerful. His rap style is beloved by fans because of how raw and honest it is. When he's rapping, you can tell that he's sincere. Honorable mention Mino ( Winner) RM ( BTS) B.I( ikon) Mark (NCT) Thanks!! —Deevin Hoang —

The previous answer that praises Stray Kids rappers, sure they are good rappers, but they aren’t the fastest and the fastest rapper in Stray kids is as fast as the fastest in Bts (suga). So saying that they are faster than Bts is false. The fastest kpop idols are Zico and Flowsik who both can rap 10.13 syllables per second. On the second place it’s Suga (Bts ) on a shared spot with Changbin (stray kids), with 9.38 syllables per second. If anyone is interested in the rest of the list RM (Bts) is third with 9.30 syllables per second. Then it’s a huge gap to the next rapper in Stray kids, on the 8th spot it’s Han with 7.63 syllables per second. These facts are from a few months ago and the “syllables per second” thing is taken from the individual fastest raps, thus far.

According to CarKpop’s list, this is the top 5:  As for the other people who the answers mentioned: RM - 9.25 SPSBobby - 9 SPSSoyeon - 8 SPSJoohoney - 7.88 SPSJennie - 7.88 SPSHan - 7.63 SPS— Also people who add Lisa, are you actually high? Her fastest is 6.25 SPS, and it’s really not considered fast.

There are a lot of Korean rappers who can rap fast. But if you’re specifically looking at idol rappers: TOP of Big Bang@ 3:08  Zico of Block B@ 2:59  Zelo of B.A.P.@1:42  Ilhoon of BTOB@ 3:14  +this video  And of course, Suga of BTS@ 0:33  Ok let’s get some girls in here Yezi of Fiestar@ 0:34 and 2:33  Chaeyoung and Dahyun of Twice@ 0:20 and 2:55  Jimin of AOAfrom 2:37 onwards

There is only one artist and he is the one and only……… Min Yoongi also known as Suga from BTS who is a South Korean rapper, songwriter, and record producer. Managed by Big Hit Entertainment, he debuted as a member of the South Korean pop idol group BTS back in 2013. He is the rapper of the biggest boy band on the Planet BTS.  You can find his fastest verse in cypher pt 2 down below. Min yoongi fast rap! Cypher pt.2

Hi! I read one of the answers and it seems that to evaluate who raps the fastest we would have to look at syllables per second. Not sure if Outsider is a K-pop artist or if it falls to this category or not but he is known for his speed rapping which is at 24 syllables per second. That's really fast! I remember watching his stage in music shows when he was promoting 'Loner'. Give it a listen! The song's pretty good too. Here's the link: Outsider - Loner MV Outsider - Loner, 아웃사이더 - 외톨이, Music Core 20090704

If its syllables per second: MALE: Suga (BTS) with 11.4 syllables per second. (cant find the video) FEMALE: *NEW RECORD set around July/August 2019* Soyeon ((G)I-DLE) with 8 or so syllables per second.  also this is only kpop not k-hiphop - there are some k-hiphop artists that can rap much faster than them both. From a proud neverland and army(maybe)

The fastest korean rapper is Outsider. He attempted for a world record and rapped 721 syllables in about 51 seconds (14.13 SPS) Changbin is actually one of the fastest kpop idol rappers. He can rap 89 syllables in 7 seconds (12.71 SPS) You can find the rap on Weekly Idol.

Have any of you heard of outsider?? He rap slightly more than 22 syllables per second. Outsider (아웃사이더) - 외톨이 (Loner) [One of fast Korean rap songs] half of the song he starts rapping really fast.) Anyways I recommend this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=duPA2hdRrFsIt’s kinda old so it won’t have Chanbin but apart from him and maybe some more newly debuted Korean artists it’s pretty accurate.

DOUBLE B from iKON composing of Bobby (Kim Jiwon) (left) and B.I (Kim Hanbin) (right) is an amazing rap line. Amongst the two, I would definitely give fastest rap to Bobby as B.I's flow is slower and more relaxed. Bobby is the first and only idol rapper to win Show Me The Money, a competition for underground rappers in Korea. Bobby did this during his days as a trainee, pre-debut. Bobby is undoubtedly an amazing rapper and spits fire when on stage. As the group iKON is lesser known that other groups, Double B doesn't receive much attention but are definitely worthy for best idol rapper titles.
ZICO (BLOCK B) (ENG SUB) Zico Can Read Quicker than Anyone Else! | Problematic Men | Mix Clip starts at 2:55CHANGBIN (STRAY KIDS) Seo Changbin Rap Compilation | All Stray Kids Songs(^_^)

Outsider once rapped 16.25 sylables per seconds, aka 130 syllables per 8 seconds. Suga had 11.83 syllables in 6 seconds when he rapped x2 in a radio interview, idk if that counts but he is second place if it does. Otherwise it is Changbing with 11.13 syllables per second in 8 seconds But Outsider is the fastest by miles There might be someone else who is faster but I can’t find anyone

Because you specified K-pop, I’m going to stick with the top 3 rappers that are also Kpop idols. I know Zico belongs here, but I can’t think of the song used to determine his syllables per second, so I’m not going to include him until I find it. TOP of BIGBANG - 10.4 syllables per sec. (Verified - “DOOM DADA”) ZELO of B.A.P. - 10.8 syllables per sec. (Verified - “PUNCH”) SUGA of BTS - 11.4 syllables per sec. (Verified - “August D”)

Well there is quite a bit but Zico, former member of Block B, and Flowsik can rap up to 10.13 syllables per second putting them as fastest. The 2nd spot is again shared with Suga, from BTS, and Changbin , from Stray kids, with being able to do 9.38 syllables per second. Finally 3rd is RM from BTS with 9.30 syllables per second. I hope this answered your question as well as some extra info.

Changbin from Stray Kids. When I read this question I immediately thought of Changbin. Min Yoongi can rap really fast too. He was born to do it after all. But I think he is holding back a bit. While some might disagree, you have the right to.

1. Changbin - 11.13 SPS 2. Zico - 10.13 SPS 3. ZELO .10.12 SPS 4. SUGA - 9.83 SPS 5. T.O.P - 9.40 SPS 6. RM - 9.25 SPS 7. Bobby and Han Jisung - 9.00 SPS 8. Mino -8.50 9. Hyunjin . 8.38 SPS 10. Soyeon 8.32 SPS SPS = syllables per second

Shin Ok-Cheol Shin Ok-cheol (Hangul: 신옥철; born 21 March 1983), known by his stage name Outsider (Hangul: 아웃사이더), is a South Korean rapper. [1] He is known for his speed-rapping and is able to rap slightly more than 22 syllables per second. [2] After a conflict between Outsider and MC Sniper's label, Sniper Sound, in July 2013, Outsider left the label and signed with ASSA. All of the infomation is frm wikipedia UwU ~~Harper
